page.title: 18Recreation (cont.)
page.content: { and flower-arranging. The old British Legion is now the home for the Storrington Social Club housing bowling and snooker clubs. The Tennis, Squash, Cricket,Football Clubs, the W.I. and Amateur Dramatic Society are popular.The Round Table and The Lions organise charity events. The Local History Club and the Sandgate Preservation Society are actively involved in the conservation of the environment. Adult Eduation classes in a wide variety of subjects are in great demand at the Rydon Community School.
